title: aclDefs
description: ACL framework definitions for a scope.

portalOwnershipCheckerClassName.description: A portal ownership access checker class.

readOwnerUserField.description: Indicates what field is used for ownership checking.

linkCheckerClassNameMap.description: Link checker classes for specific links. Should implement `Espo\Core\Acl\LinkChecker`.

link.description: A link name to check access to a related record instead of an actual record. Actual if access checker is Espo\Core\Acl\AccessChecker\AccessCheckers\Foreign.

accountLink.description: A link with Account that will be used when access control applied for portal users. As of v9.0.0.

contactLink.description: A link with Contact that will be used when access control applied for portal users. As of v9.0.0.
